keyMoments.title: Execute Jinbe's Strategic Plan
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully execute a coordinated plan devised by Jinbe, with each member playing a specific role to save Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's growth in teamwork and strategic thinking post-time skip.

keyMoments.title: Begin Battle Against New Fish-Man Pirates
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats prepare to engage in a major battle against the New Fish-Man Pirates and their remaining forces at Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the decisive battle that will determine Fish-Man Island's fate.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Witness Luffy's Overwhelming Power
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates witness in shock as Luffy's Conqueror's Haki knocks out 50,000 of their 100,000-strong army.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power gap between the crew and the Straw Hats, particularly Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Engage the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Despite losing half their forces, the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare to battle the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the climactic confrontation between the two crews.
